modal.title: Participe da nossa pesquisa para melhorar o serviço, ficaríamos extremamente gratos.

header.title: Ship stuff people need.
header.description: Product teams are overwhelmed with tools. With feedl, your entire feedback workflow is in one place.

about.title: What feedl solves for you
about.subtitle: The all-in-one tool to explore, prioritize, plan, deliver, and communicate featues with your customers.

feedback.title: Listen to your users, stakeholders, and teammates.
feedback.description: Share a portal with users from inside and outside your organization to gather their insights in an engaging way with voting and commenting features.

prioritize.title: Prioritize what to build with confidence
prioritize.description: Use weighted scores for each of your users' requests to identify quick wins by viusalizing priorities on a map based on complexity and value drivers.

roadmap.title: Plan your product priorities.
roadmap.description: Build roadmaps that links your users' requests to the high level goals so everyone has visibility on what's coming.

changelog.title: Keep users and stakeholders updated
changelog.subtitle: Keep your organization and users engaged with product updates announcements
changelog.description: Announce your latest product changes, new features, bug fixes, news and more with Beamer’s changelog app and improve user engagement.
